title: Can white people use the N- word in Hip Hop Context?
itunes:title: Can white people use the N- word in Hip Hop Context?
description:
Tuesday 11/14- Today on the show we had our man Gary V stop by, where he spoke about his new book "Crushing It", how to be an successful entrepreneur and more. Also after Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to Peter Vecsey for using the n-word in a hip hop context we opened up the phone lines to see if our listeners had a problem with it. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Tuesday 11/14- Today on the show we had our man Gary V stop by, where he spoke about his new book "Crushing It", how to be an successful entrepreneur and more. Also after Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to Peter Vecsey for using the n-word in a hip hop context we opened up the phone lines to see if our listeners had a problem with it. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
